```{r libraries}
silently <- suppressPackageStartupMessages
library("dplyr") |> silently()
library("stringr") |> silently() # forest finder
library("glue") |> silently() 
library("knitr") |> silently() # table printing
library("sf") |> silently()
library("mapview") |> silently() # quick inspection
library("purrr") |> silently() # apply spatial operations
library("inbospatial") |> silently() # wfs query

```

```{r}
areas_statusquo <- sf::st_read("amphibia_areas.gpkg")
areas_addition <- sf::st_read("wn_buffer.gpkg")

mapview::mapview(areas_addition, col.regions = "yellow") +
  mapview::mapview(areas_statusquo, col.regions = "black")
```

```{r}

areas_all <- sf::st_union(areas_statusquo, areas_addition) %>%
  sf::st_as_sfc() %>% 
  sf::st_union()

mapview::mapview(areas_all)
```



```{r}
st_write(areas_all,
  dsn = "amphibia_areas.gpkg",
  layer = 'amphibia_protection_areas',
  append = FALSE
)
```
